main event: An experienced private pilot observed a cigar-shaped blue-green object emitting a bright glow over Martinsburg, Ohio on 24 September 1962.
interesting points: The object was moving at an estimated speed of over 1000 mph., It was observed for a brief period of approximately 10 to 15 seconds., The object was around 30 to 40 feet in length when overhead., No sound was heard during the sighting., The object appeared to fade away rather than accelerate out of sight.
sighted object: cigar-shaped blue-green object emitting a bright glow
witness description: an experienced private pilot whose name and address have been withheld at his request
